Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description: Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field This is the unique identifier of the Application record

Criminal.title: Criminal
Criminal.description: This is from the Criminal Input The user needs to specify whether they have a criminal record or not, if yes then they need to give an explanation Format: Text To populate the Criminal_record__c field on the Applicant record

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Format: Email This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

FamInPWC.title: FamInPWC
FamInPWC.description: This is from the FamInPWC input The User needs to specify whether they have family in the company Field to update on Application: Family_in_PWC__c Format: Text

FirstPrefOffice.title: FirstPrefOffice
FirstPrefOffice.description: This is from the FirstPrefOffice input The User will indicate which office they prefer Format: Text Field to update on Application: Preferred_Office__c

FirstUniversityChoice.title: FirstUniversityChoice
FirstUniversityChoice.description: The User will indicate to which University they have applied for When they are asked to do so Format: Text. Use output to update First_University_Choice__c field

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description: These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically

SAICA.title: SAICA
SAICA.description: From the SAICA Input The User needs to indicate if they have ever been a member of the CAICA Format: Text To populate the Been_in_a_SAICA_Contract__c field on the Candidate record

SecondPrefOffice.title: SecondPrefOffice
SecondPrefOffice.description: From the SecondPrefOffice Input The User will indicate which office they prefer second Format: Text To populate the Second_preferred_office__c on the Applicant record
